content.para: The World Trade-Center attack, strongly influenced the Developer to rejoin the military, as a result, serve abroad in the Afghanistan war. The Developer departed the military in sight of applying his knowledge in hands-on-building automation and successfully installed a fully integrated communication system within a 3000-pers apartment complex, in toronto and then was picked up by Mircom Technologies Inc.
The military, work experience,COVID and educational experience influenced his descision on pursueing Full Stack Development.

In sight of a hands-on approach and the effect of COVID on the world's market, the Developer entered the full web development field due to  its influencing power to market industry, acccentuated by COVID. Today, the primare entry point, into the World Market is through the internet and the difference between the Successful versus Not-so-successful company is just a 'click' away.
Full Innovative Web-Development is what we strive for each and every day - Always Striving for new Heights .

title: Professional Profile
content: Desire to work on contract with start-up to mid-companies who are in need of a well rounded experienced web and portal designer, with knowledge and skills in  front and back end development, database management, electronics and  automation.

This is systematically done through smart user-sign-up incentives,manage/automate SEOs,dynamic updates of Blogs and Reviews, as well as , dynamic bi-monthly email distribution of specials.

title: Quality Assurance Contract Specialists(QACS), Lieutenant
